entries.content:
Verified ui-chat-tabs.css refactoring:
- Monolithic file: 383 lines with 10 mixed concerns
- Modular system: 27-line orchestrator + 13 focused files
- All functionality preserved: glassmorphism, animations, states, responsive, accessibility
- Backend already configured to use modular version (ResourceManager.ts:89)
- Ready to delete obsolete monolithic file

CSS refactoring cleanup completed:
- Deleted obsolete ui-chat-tabs.css (383 lines)
- Modular system verified working (chat-tabs/chat-tabs.css)
- Build successful with no errors
- Application ready for testing with cleaned up codebase
